name: Tower Hero - Protect The Tower
description:
Fun tower defense!
The tower is there!
【How to Play】
*Start the game, install the tower defense facilities first!
* When the enemy attacks, be careful, there will be attacks on the left and right!
* Aim at the enemy, shoot and shoot! Keep the enemy away from the tower as much as possible.
* Pay attention to strengthening the defense facilities of the tower at all times!
【features】
* Gold coins can be won in the game to exchange for props;
*Each level is a different challenge；
Come on, protect your tower!
